overview: Rudi Roelofse is the acting CEO and founder of Prudic.com .he is still a high school student which caused lots of legal difficulty. Prudic started as a online retail store for the elite. Prudic is currently reorganizing and also provides network audits for companies. They started a hardware development extension and their first products are to be seen by next year march according to rumors. He is noted as one of the most dynamic and upcoming CEO’s and youngest to ever reach such success.
